title: json "arrntv" format can sometime produce invalid json
description:
In SOLR-9972, it was reported that requesting multiple collations from the SpellCheckComponent and speciying "json.nl=arrntv", can produce invalid json.  See the description of SOLR-9972 for an example.

The first pass at fixing this modified SpellCheckComponent.  However, this caused a regression for another output format.  It would be better if we could make the "arrntv" response writer more robust.
